hobbies.title: Volleyball
hobbies.description: High-performance volleyball player in the National Second Division (2020 - present). Played 4 years in the Spanish second-highest division (3 years in Villalba and 1 year in Alcorc√≥n), frequently ranked among the top players of the week. Currently focusing on beach volleyball, ranked in the top 60 players in Spain.

hobbies.title: Code Contest Enthusiast

hobbies.title: Percussionist
